DataElement.preferredName: Adjuvant Chemotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to adjuvant chemotherapy treatment as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adjuvant Chemotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Drug therapy given to augment or stimulate some other form of treatment such as surgery or radiation therapy. Adjuvant chemotherapy is commonly used in the therapy of cancer and can be administered before or after the primary treatment._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Drug therapy given to augment or stimulate some other form of treatment such as surgery or radiation therapy. Adjuvant chemotherapy is commonly used in the therapy of cancer and can be administered before or after the primary treatment.

Concepts.definition: Chemotherapy that is administered subsequent to the main treatment plan to minimize or prevent disease recurrence.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient scheduled to be tr
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient scheduled to be treated with adjuvant consolidation chemotherapy at the conclusion of their standard chemoradiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If enrolled in the Dose Escalation Cohort, has adjuvant chemotherapy been counted as one line of treatment if received within 6 months of their cancer recurring?
